youTubeSubscriptionExtended.extendedHelp: Manage the YouTube subscriptions for this server.
explainedUsage: The channel to send the upload or live notifications.
The message to send in the specified channel.
examples: set upload message {{channel.name}} has uploaded a new video `{{title}}` at {{time}}, go check it out! {{url}}

youTubeSubscriptionListEmpty: You do not have any YouTube subscription in this server, who will be the first?
youTubeSubscriptionUploadChannel: Successfully set the upload channel to {{channel}}.
youTubeSubscriptionUploadMessage:
Successfully set the message for upload notifications to:
>>> {{content}}
youTubeSubscriptionLiveChannel: Successfully set the live channel to {{channel}}.
youTubeSubscriptionLiveMessage:
Successfully set the message for live notifications to:
>>> {{content}}
youtubeSubscriptionInvalidYouTubeUrlHost: The URL must be from <https://www.youtube.com>, but I received `{{parameter}}` instead.
youtubeSubscriptionInvalidYouTubeUrlPath: The URL must be from a valid channel, however, `{{parameter}}` does not seem to be one.
youtubeSubscriptionInvalidSetKey:
I could not resolve `{{parameter}}` to a valid `set` sub-command.
**Hint**: the following options are allowed:

- `upload channel` / `upload-channel`.
- `upload message` / `upload-message`.
- `live channel` / `live-channel`.
- `live message` / `live-message`.
youtubeSubscriptionInvalidSetActionKey:
I could not resolve `{{parameter}}` to a valid `set` action.
**Hint**: the following options are allowed:

- `channel`.
- `message`.
